title: Expiration of developer's public reports
context: [ยง514B-59] Expiration of developer&rsquo;s public reports. Except as otherwise provided in this chapter, upon issuance of an effective date for a developer&rsquo;s public report or any amendment, the developer&rsquo;s public report and amendment or amendments shall not expire until such time as the developer has sold all units in the project. [L 2005, c 93, pt of ยง3]
